attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is the child rapist paul nicholls not being charged in connection to what he done to cherrell a 13yr old girl who took her own life the proof is there so why not make the guilty pau for her death are we that insensitive to say its bad publicity for the cadets cherrell has lost her life ok he is up for sexual charges against another cadet in his care/charge make this man accountable please

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
